text: Tales From The Cryptkeeper is a 1990s Canadian American and French animated television series. It was Co-Produced by Nelvana and Fantome Animation (S3) and produced in association with YTV and the Participation of Teletoon (S3) ABC (S1-2) and CBS (S3). Category:1990s American animated television series Category:1993 Canadian television series debuts Category:1999 Canadian television series debuts Category:1999 Canadian television series endings
title: Tales from the Cryptkeeper
